comments.author: Don Pedro Dinero
comments.body: Quote from: Ivekzg on February 11, 2023, 02:44:30 PMPlease I don't want negative comments or anything negative. When you are in a public forum, what you post is open to criticism. I've seen quite a few threads like this one, which end up not being updated at some point, I guess when the results are too bad to show. Everyone, no matter how good they are, is going to encounter spells of negative results. However, I see that there are a few members who know more about sports betting than I do and seem to trust your judgement, so I'm going to wish you luck. Quote from: QueenVera on February 19, 2023, 02:32:56 AMI went through your work and you're really doing a great job and it's not mostly easy to do selfless jobs <...>Are you sure it is selfless? In other cases I have seen threads that start like this only to end up wanting to charge for the predictions after showing a series of profitable results. With a thread that is only 8 days old it seems too early to say. However, I would be fine with that in any case. If the OP showed a predictive ability that consistently gave profitable results and someone wanted to pay for it, it would be a free deal between individuals. The problem for me in these cases is that you don't know what part variance plays in the results in these samples.
